fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Initiate a revolution through a card game known as Kingdom Attack. 1 use.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- After 5 total rounds, the game changes back.
- Anyone who dies in KA also dies in GIM. Their KA role is not revealed, but their GIM role is.
- In a VIP mode, the VIP becomes the King, but is not publicly revealed.
- If there is one good faction, its members will become either Order or Society, and they will win together.
- If there are two good factions, one faction's members will become Order, the other's will become Society. They will not be able to win together.
- If there is one evil faction, its members will become either Chaos or Apostle.
- If there are two evil factions, one will become Chaos and one will become Apostle.
- If there are 3 or more of one type of faction, this cannot spawn.
- Neutrals become an Outsider with as close to their original goal as possible. Your goal will be to simply survive.
- Dead players do not join.
- GIM will be halted so KA can take place.
- You may only use your ability starting on night 2. It takes effect the next day.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Survive to the end of your KA game.
